org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.pipeline
Class LoaderAdapter<T>

java.lang.Object
  org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.pipeline.LoaderAdapter<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.app.LoaderManager.LoaderCallbacks<T>, LoaderPipe<T>, Pipe<T>
public class LoaderAdapter<T>
extends Object
implements LoaderPipe<T>, android.app.LoaderManager.LoaderCallbacks<T>

This class wraps a Pipe in an asynchronous Loader. This classes uses Loaders from android.conent. It will not work on pre Honeycomb devices. If you do need to support Android devices < version 3.0, consider using SupportLoaderAdapter
